features: 【Save Money】 - Bluetooth Label Printer with direct thermal technology, don't require ink, toner, or ribbons. This inkless label printer lower cost compared to inkjet printers. A variety of colors and sizes D11 Labels to choose in our store.Operation video of Label Maker:https://www.amazon.com/vdp/0e7a017b44964013a234b42162eabcfc

【ATTENTION & PRINT】 - D11 Portable label printer support Bluetooth connect to use, only works with IOS, Android smartphone and iPad. The App is downloaded from APP STORE or Google Play and supports bar-code, qr code, picture, scan code, text, Excel import, smart OCR scanner, massive vivid icons, easily create your own customized labels , preview and save record, improving efficiency.It can be Large-capacity continuous printing, which can complete 50-160 more than one continuous repeat printing.

【WIDELY USED】From labeling file folders to food storage, from organizing your clothes, supplies, tools and sports equipment, and even from decorating cards to wrapping gifts.They come in a wide variety of colors for easy, at-a-glance coding and organization. They are ideal for hundreds of tasks around the home or office, such as filing, storage, and asset management.

【Bluetooth Connection & Compatible with IOS & Android 】 Connect D11 printer in App, not in system settings.When loading the paper, please make sure the sticker side facing down. Wireless mini label maker can print within 10-meter away from the smartphone connected by Bluetooth 4.0. About some cell phone can‘'t connect, the software system has been repaired, you just need to update New firmware in the App settings can be connected smoothly.

【Compact Size & 1200mAh Long-Endurance】5.3*3.3*1.25 Inch, about 7oz weight, which you can put Sticker Maker Machine Printer in your pocket or bag. Logo Maker Machine is built in a 1200mAh Rechargeable Battery, which keep printing for 4 hours, and standby at least 1 week. Plus, D11 label maker machine comes with a roll of 160Pcs 12*40mm label tape( inside the machine) .If using the device for the first time, please charge the device for at least 20 minutes before turning it on.
body.description: D11 Label Maker Machine Handheld Sticker Mini Labeler Designed for those home offices or small businesses that need simple, two line text labels, the D11 Label Maker is easy to use and requires no complex training.These features allow users to easily type text and review it for errors before printing the label. This saves time, reduce mistakes, and helps save money on misprints. Printing method: Thermal print Printing accuracy: 203dpi Printing speed: 30mm/s~60mm/s Label width range: 12-15mm Connection method: Bluetooth Print content: texts,barcodes, QR codes, table,picture,scan code,serial number, Excel , time, line, graphics, symbols, logos, etc. Battery Type: Rechargeable Endurance: Can work continuously for 4~5 hours

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: D11 Bluetooth Mini Label Maker D11 Label Maker Machine with Tape The Label Maker D11 comes with a variety of frames, font styles, and fun decoration patterns to create labels that really stand out. In fact, users can create stylish labels for personal or business items using many patterns. Simply select the template typesetting materials and type the text to create your customized labels. Having the flexibility to select and change different tape colors enhances the label making process. This label maker is great for those looking to create labels for school items, gift bags, storage bins, file folders, and more.

Package List: 1 x D11 Label Printer1 x User Manual1 x USB Cable1 x Roll label tape(inside the label maker) The Organizer D11 Label Maker with Label Tapes uses Genuine tapes that are available in 1/2 Inches, 5/9 Inches and 5/8 Inches (12 millimeter, 14 millimeter, 15 millimeter) widths and multiple color options. It features an auto power off function in case you forget to turn it off after use. D11 Label Maker Machine Handheld Sticker Mini Labeler Designed for those home offices or small businesses that need simple, two line text labels, the D11 Label Maker is easy to use and requires no complex training.These features allow users to easily type text and review it for errors before printing the label. This saves time, reduce mistakes, and helps save money on misprints. Printing method: Thermal print Printing accuracy: 203dpi Printing speed: 30mm/s~60mm/s Label width range: 12-15mm Connection method: Bluetooth Print content: texts,barcodes, QR codes, table,picture,scan code,serial number, Excel , time, line, graphics, symbols, logos, etc. Battery Type: Rechargeable Endurance: Can work continuously for 4~5 hours

Installation Steps Our service agreement is very safe. Please rest assured to download. Please follow these installation steps,Once you start using it, you will like it very much. 1.Search and download App through your phone's application center or Google application market. 2.Open the App and choose the D11 Series Printer. 3.Connect D11 printer in App，not in system settings. 4.When loading the paper, please make sure the sticker side facing down. 5.When printing, please ensure that the printed content is within the red print box, otherwise the complete content will not be printed.

Monthly update of the template and icon The Label Maker D11 comes with a variety of frames, font styles, and fun decoration patterns to create labels that really stand out. In fact, users can create stylish labels for personal or business items using many patterns. Simply select the template typesetting materials and type the text to create your customized labels. Having the flexibility to select and change different tape colors enhances the label making process. This label maker is great for those looking to create labels for school items, gift bags, storage bins, file folders, and more. Note: The printer is not limited to templates and graphics on the application.You can design your own graphics and designs as you like. And convert them to images, and click "Image" to insert the picture.

Multifunctional printing smart OCR scanner（Image Recognition）-Automatically recognize picture information Multifunctional printing including texts,barcodes, QR codes, table,picture,scan code,serial number, Excel import, time, line, graphics, symbols, logos, etc. Automatically Recognize Template This Portable label printer has intelligent chip reading function, App automatically identified the size and pattern paper roll, which makes it more intimate to use. Note:The sticker on the side of the roll contains a printing sensor chip. Please do not tear or destruct the sticker , otherwise it will affect the printing effect. When purchasing label printing consumables, please choose the adapted one or recommended by the machine seller ,to get the best printing results. Add Your Personal Touch With multiple fonts, unique styles, frames, and symbols, the App lets you add your personal touch to whatever you are labeling. There are also multiple quick and easy templates simply type in what you want and then press print.

So Many Uses Our Label Tapes is made of polypropylene and has a waterproof backing membrane. Thermal transfer printing- no ink or toner. Easy-to-peel split backing for simple application, print clear and durable labels. They are waterproof, tear-resistant, oil-proof, flexible and self-adhesive. Standard labels are ideal for hundreds of tasks around the home or office, such as filing, storage, and asset management. Add a personal touch to labels with a company logo or personal graphics, or print barcodes for inventory or sales use.They come in a wide variety of colors for easy, at-a-glance coding and organization. From labeling file folders to food storage, from organizing your clothes, supplies, tools and sports equipment, and even from decorating cards to wrapping gifts once you start using the LabelManager D11, you’ll find an endless array of uses around your home and home office. Useful Reminder: IT WON'T CHARGE ANY PENNY FOR DOWNLOAD OR USING OUR APP! If reminded that you need to pay for our APP, that's an advertisement of the app center, please ignore or report it. If you don’t want to register an account the first you use,you can SKIP the registration step,REGISTER THE ACCOUNT IS FOR CUSTOMERS TO KEEP THE LABELs AND EASY TO FIND AND PRINT OUT AGAIN IN FUTURE. Please USE A CHARGER DIRECTLY while you need charging the label maker,not the USB ports of other electronic equipment. The machine will flash a blue light when connecting the power supply , even if the charging is completed. The default print density is 2, you can adjust it to 3 or enlarge and bold the content by needs. As for Android： the App needs to turn on the phone's GPS positioning function before connecting. Since the version of the android phone was updated to 10.0, Google has strengthened the user privacy policy, Google requires the user to open all permissions that need to be enabled before using the app. The Ios Phone system doesn't need this requirement. Note 2. This label maker is Monochrome Printing Output, only black text. If you want to create color label artwork, require printing with color patterned label tapes.

D11 CLEAR LABEL TAPE D11 WHITE LABEL TAPE D11 LABEL TAPE-Colorful Round D11 LABEL TAPE-Funny Fruit D11 LABEL TAPE-Cute Fish D11 LABEL TAPE-Cute Ribbons Color Monochrome Monochrome 3 Colors 3 Colors 4 Colors 3 Colors Size 14 x 40mm 15 x 50mm 14 x 28mm 14 x 50mm 14 x 50mm 14 x 70mm Lables/Roll 160 130 220 130 130 100

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this product. It’s easy to use, and makes perfect labels. I can’t recommend this enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect business tool!
reviews.reviewText: This product works wonders and is very easy to use. No regrets on this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: app that goes with it is so helpful and easy to use. connects super easily and battery lasts long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flexible, limitless uses, tiny print
reviews.reviewText: This printer is exactly as adertised. Several templates, fonts, as well as tape colors and options, etc. I'm able to use it on my laptop as well as my iPhone via bluetooth. Set up is very easy and print quality is excellent. It also prints quickly. However, the entire screen of options and settings is very small. The print is tiny and I'm having a difficult time navigating all the choices. Quality and price are probably unbeatable; but I do get frustrated by the size of the screen, which is still iphone size on my laptop. I ordered 3; one for me and two for gifts. I'm keeping mine, but returning the other two for fear they won't be used. If I could discover a way to enlarge the options screen on my laptop I'd give this 5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for iPhone
reviews.reviewText: There’s an app that is easy to follow and use. Within a couple minutes, I was able to add photos and make labels. Excellent product! It will only allow you to remember 10 labels, unless you buy a monthly/yearly subscription to access extra fonts and reprint any of the last 41 labels without redesigning them.If making new labels from scratch that need photo editing, it does turn off while standing by. Wish it would stay on a bit longer before turning off. It came charged enough to use right away and for quite a long time. Buy with confidence. Super easy to learn and utilize. Comes with everything needed, except for a charging brick. It has the usb to micro usb cable included. In box: D11 label maker, charging cable (no brick), quick start instruction manual, one roll of labels. I suggest getting an extra roll of the desired label size and the case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for every kind of label project
reviews.reviewText: I bought this over a year ago, it has been a terrific help to labeling things with small labels. I've labeled jars with food, bags, containers for storage, ect, but this time it was perfect for travel pill case for ibuprofen for my kids. I wanted to make sure I had the right measurements/dosage if they needed any and this label was the perfect size to copy the info over and stick it on the travel case. I cannot say enough of how great it is, and no need for ink, just the right paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Just as described and awesome results!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Seemed awesome from the pics showing what it can do. 2 apps later and I still can't figure out how to do any of those things. At one point, I figured out how to use something someone else created and shared and change the wording to what I needed. At no time could I create my own design unless I only wanted text alone. I gave up on it and gave it to my husband who had a use for it. All in all, I thought it was cute, small and very portable. I liked that it didn't need ink. For me, I'd prefer something with a little more definition in the smaller print, kinda hard to read. It just wasn't for me, but my husband is thrilled with it.
